member.name: IPV6_MREQ
member.summary: The ipv6_mreq structure provides multicast group information for IPv6 addresses.

member.name: IPV6_MREQ.ipv6mr_multiaddr
member.summary: The address of the IPv6 multicast group.

member.name: IPV6_MREQ.ipv6mr_interface
member.summary: The interface index of the local interface on which the multicast group should be joined or dropped. If this member specifies an interface index of 0, the default multicast interface is used.
